Ok, I kinda know how to change it but which one do I change?

} else { TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
